title: Cannot install league of legends
body: I keep getting the error posted in the picture every time i try to install the game. I don't know how to fix this.

replies.body: This error is usually caused by a security config that's preventing the game from installing.  Go over the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide so that your pc settings will allow installation to finish.  Let me know if you have any questions!
